courses.name: Identity & Access Management - Learn LDAP, SAML, OAuth, OpenID
courses.description: Identity management, also known as identity and access management, is a framework of policies and technologies for ensuring that the proper people in an enterprise have the appropriate access to technology resources.

courses.name: React - The Complete Guide
courses.description: Master React with comprehensive coverage of hooks, context API, routing, and state management patterns for building modern web applications.
topics: Context API and state management patterns

courses.name: Advanced CSS & Sass
courses.description: Deep dive into modern CSS techniques and Sass preprocessing for creating responsive, maintainable, and scalable stylesheets.

courses.name: Node.js - The Complete Guide
courses.description: Build scalable backend applications with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for developing full-stack web applications.

courses.name: Web Design for Beginners
courses.description: Foundational web design principles including layout, color theory, typography, and responsive design for modern web.
topics: Web design principles and best practices

courses.name: Python for Data Science
courses.description: Data analysis and visualization using pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib for extracting insights from datasets.

courses.name: Git & GitHub Complete Guide
courses.description: Version control mastery with Git workflows, branching strategies, and collaborative development practices.

courses.name: TypeScript Masterclass
courses.description: Advanced TypeScript concepts including generics, decorators, and type system mastery for building robust applications.
